control_block.py¶

class modules.telemetry.control_block.ControlBlock(subtype: ControlBlockSubtype)¶

Abstract base class defining the interface for control blocks.

Attributes:

subtype (ControlBlockSubtype): The subtype of the control block.

class modules.telemetry.control_block.SignalReportControlBlock¶

Represents a control block requesting a signal report.

Attributes:

mission_time (int): The mission time. snr (int): The signal-to-noise ratio. tx_power (int): The transmission power.

exception modules.telemetry.control_block.ControlDataBlockException¶

Exception raised for errors related to control data blocks.

exception modules.telemetry.control_block.ControlBlockUnknownException¶

Exception raised when an unknown control block subtype is encountered.
